english.title: At my Best
text: I change to the better with you
I now want to be like you
because now you are in my life
that can describe to you what I am experiencing
Your breath1 is worth the world to me
You are my dreams and my reality
my love, [you are] what I dream of
You have the right to me
and it is your right that I
Set yourself at ease, I will never hurt [you]
In any case, I would not be able to be happy
unless I see that you are well

arabic.title: أهم يوم
text: فرحانة لي وزي اي بنت عادي
في عيونه ده شايفني ملكة في عيونه
ياه عليه كان قد وعده صادق فيه

english.title: The Most Important Day
text: I'm happy for myself and like any other girl it doesn't matter
the most important day of my life has come
and tonight I won't be able to fall asleep
My feelings for him have come right on time
and tonight I shall be his wife
and share him all his life
he was up to his word and stayed true to it
He says something and then goes through with it
And no matter how much I go on about him
Where does he even find all this gentleness
I think he's one of a kind
If not for him, who would I live for
there's something missing in my life
I'd say it's enough that he's in it
because it's the best life that I'm about to start
In his eyes, he sees me as a queen, in his eyes
It doesn't matter who there was before him
I will carry him in my heart and cherish him
he was up to his word and stayed true to it
He says something and then goes through with it
And no matter how much I go on about him

english.title: God forgive me
text: Infront of him and he can't see me
Or he's pretending not to know me.
Is it possible that he forgot me
He'll be back for me tomorrow
And the minute he finds me
I've been mistaken, God forgive me
I've been mistaken, he hurt me.
Even though I still loved him
It was obvious. From his words
After he goes away a little bet
He said maybe this separation will be a good thing for us
And longing will gather us again
And I found that he's been lying to me.

arabic.title: بروحلك
text: بروحلك كنت  وانا خايفة عشان ارتاح
يا اكتر حد من قلبي ضحكت معاه
في حضنك نفسي زي زمان  في يوم ابكي
في بعدك عني مش لاقياني ليه يا سنين
بموت يا حبيبي وهاموت بس في الحالتين
هاسلم قلبي في غيابك لناس تانين
واحشني وعايشة على حس اللي عشته معاك
وبعدك عني لو بايديا كنت اختار
اموت يا حبيبي ولا انك تروح مني

english.title: I go to you.
text: I used to go to you when i was scared, to calm down.
And you know, You listened when I spoke Oh person I have laughed most from my heart with.
In you're embrace , I wish like the past , one day to cry in.
Inn your distance from me , i can't find myself, Why oh years!
And I am going to die but it both cases, i Love you and i will still love you and it is impossible that i will ever surrender my heart to anybody else.
I miss you and i live on the memories of what i lived with you.
In your missingness from my world i stopped talking to it and it stopped talking to me.
And i it was my choice , I would choose to die my love before ever losing you.

english.title: talking
text: and say that i hate him
everything that is happening is too much
he made me in front of him
and he never felt and sensed me and i wish

arabic.title: حبيت الدنيا
text: دانا اقول فى حبك العمر كله
ده انا من زمان و انا بستناك
و بحسك فى الدينا دى بعيش

english.title: I Loved the World
text: And I thought I was living
Turns out I was being deceived
I can speak of your love forever
Oh darling, and the words wouldn't be enough
I loved the world when I am with you
my life now has a flavor with you
I have been waiting for you for ages
an entire life dreaming of you
Just tell me what would please you
if I am to die for you
I am holding myself back and really want to
Don't leave me for one day
You have a place in my heart more than I have for myself, nobody is as precious as you in this world
You are the happiness of my life
and I am alive in this world because you are there

arabic.title: حكايات بنات
text: مجروحة و نفسها تتكلم وبتتألم ومابتبينش
والتانية بتغلط مية مرة وبتعيد الغلطة متتعلمش
وفي واحدة البعد معذبها حبيبها سايبها ونفسها تنساه
اكتر من واحدة بتتعذب وانا بستغرب من اللي انا شيفاه
وفي كل حكاية دي فيها أسرار وحاجات
هتخدنا ساعات وياريت كل ده بيريح حد
واللي يعيش في الدنيا دي ياما يشوف
وجع القلب اللي في كل النهايات معروف
طول عمرها عايشة مبتحبش وما بتملش ولا حاسة بضعف
والتانية بتهرب من قصة على قصة بتشبه لها بالحرف
ع اللي في ايديها وباصلها فيه
وَفِيَّ كل حكاية دِي فِيها أسرار حاجات
هتخدنا ساعات وياريت كل ده بيريح حَدّ
وَاللَيّ يعيش فِيَّ الدُنْيا دِي ياما يشوف
وَجَع القَلْب اللَيّ فِيَّ كُلّ النِهايات معروف

english.title: حكايات بناتGirls’ stories
text: She is hurt and wants to talk but she doesn’t show it
The other one makes 100 mistakes yet she repeats them and never learns
Another girl is tormented by distance. Her lover has left her and she wants to forget him
Many girls are hurting and I am wondering about what I see
In every story there are secrets and stuff
To tell it, we need hours
As if that would make it any easier
Whoever lives in this life will see lots
Heartbreak in the end is known
So eventually we tell each other
All her life she’s never been in love, never bored, never weak
The other one runs from one story to another story literally the same
This girl is envied by the world
For whatever she’s got, they will look at it
How? Even we mix them up
In every story there are secrets and stuff
To tell it, we need hours
As if that would make it any easier
Whoever lives in this life will see lots
Heartbreak in the end is known
So eventually we tell each other

arabic.title: خنت الوعد
text: ماهو كل قاسى و لية نهاية
قلبى ماعدش تحت الامر و انت
حر دة العيب كان منى انا

english.title: betrayed the promise
text: this easily, you betrayed the promise
thats okay, ive done a mistake
ive lived in an illusion and a concern
that is big and god forgive you
im not going to cry and tear out
ill find something to forget about it
and this world is between you and me
have patience and tomorrow you'll see
everyone who is harsh has an ending
you never really felt me inside
your telling to separate and thats it
my heart is not there anymore and you
free, the mistake was from me
you made me feel a kind of guilt
ill walk away and take the guilt
what a loss for this love.

arabic.title: سنين
text: بقالى سنين بدارى كتير هواك زودلى نارى
كنت اعدى ومش فى بالى قلت جاى اليوم هعيش
ليالى بعاد كفاية تعالى قرب عيش معايا
انت ليه عامل حكاية ده غير هواك مايهمنيش
بقالى سنين بدارى كتير هواك زودلى نارى
ليالى بعاد كفاية تعالى قرب عيش معايا
هتغيب سنين فاكراك طب اعمل ايه
بقى كل ده وناسياك هقولك ايه
بقالى سنين بدارى كتير هواك زودلى نارى
تعبت انا من حنينى ياللى ليك سهرانة عينى
كل ده وقلبك ناسينى قوللى اخر البعد ايه
ماتجى تشوفنى مالى قاعدة بستناك فى حالى
انت فين جاوب سؤالى يرضى مين اللى احنا فيه
تعبت انا من حنينى ياللى ليك سهرانة عينى
كل ده وقلبك ناسينى قوللى اخر البعد ايه
ماتجى تشوفنى مالى قاعدة بستناك فى حالى
هتغيب سنين فاكراك طب اعمل ايه
بقى كل ده وناسياك هقولك ايه
بقالى سنين بدارى كتير هواك زودلى نارى
كنت اعدى ومش فى بالى قلت جاى اليوم هعيش
ليالى بعاد كفاية تعالى قرب عيش معايا
انت ليه عامل حكاية ده غير هواك مايهمنيش

english.title: Years
text: I spent many years thinking over your love and my passion grew
I was infected with you, not in my right mind, and I said come today and I'll live
The nights of separation are too much already; come here to me and live with me
Why are you doing this to me? Nothing matters to me but your love
I spent many years thinking over your love and my passion grew
I was infected with you, not in my right mind
The nights of separation are too much already; come here to me and live with me
Why are you doing this to me?
My love, I miss you and by God, I will meet you
Because I can see you from afar
I'll keep thinking about you even if you are away for years; what am I to do?
I lived my dreams when I was with you,
I felt like myself with you,
And you are forgetting all this! What will I say to you?
I spent many years thinking over your love and my passion grew
I was infected with you, not in my right mind
I grew tired of my tenderness, oh you for whom my eyes stay awake at night
And through all of this, your heart forgets me; tell me why this separation?
You don't come to see me; what's the matter with me? I'm sitting here waiting for you like this
Where are you? Answer my questions! Who is satisfied by what we're going through?
I grew tired of my tenderness, oh you for whom my eyes stay awake at night
And through all of this, your heart forgets me; tell me why this separation?
You don't come to see me; what's the matter with me? I'm sitting here waiting for you like this
Where are you? Answer my questions!
My love, I miss you and by God, I will meet you
Because I can see you from afar
I'll keep thinking about you even if you are away for years; what am I to do?
I lived my dreams when I was with you,
I felt like myself with you,
And you are forgetting all this! What will I say to you?
I spent many years thinking over your love and my passion grew
I was infected with you, not in my right mind, and I said come today and I'll live
The nights of separation are too much already; come here to me and live with me
Why are you doing this to me? Nothing matters to me but your love

english.title: I see you
text: You miss me and you care about me
and you're scared that I'll forget you
those things that are a surprise between us
especially since the day we separated
your love was clear to me
I tell you what, don't come
It will benefit you and me
and I found a solution with you
Always a gift and a surprise
you say my love suddenly surfaced
you come to it and realize its importance

english.title: A little mistake
text: I knew from the beginning you had that in mind
You make mistakes and my heart forgives
You remain my lover even when you make mistakes
A little mistake and I let it go
let it go no matter what
As long as you are in my heart
A little mistake and I let it go
With love I let your slips go
With Love I forgave your mistakes
I forget to fulfill your desires
A little mistake and I let it go
I know you went too far with your stubbornness
you got further with distance and absence
A little mistake and I let it go
that I forgive even if you meant it
A little mistake and I let it go
Forget about it  don't think of it
A mistake won't make me love you less
I still love you and next to you
A little mistake and I let it go
You remain my lover even when you make mistakes
A little mistake and I let it go

arabic.title: مش ندمانة
text: زي انت ما كنت بتأذيني بكرة هاتأذيك

english.title: I regret nothing
text: Never loved me in the first place
I've lived my life on the basis
that you, my love, would never hurt me
And I'd be lying if I said
that I didn't use to trust you
You were all that I had left
But I was only a fool
all this time who you really are?
taught me never to believe or trust
I had to go through it
The wound will heal in time
And I will laugh at you tomorrow
Like you used to hurt you, tomorrow you'll be hurt
And you'll deserve it; let me see how you'll handle it

arabic.title: مين ده اللي رافضني
text: مين ده اللي رافضني و هايسيبني
ده انا اهد الارض في عز
مش انا اللي اتساب خالص على فكرة
طب ده انا والنعمة اخطفه واحبسه
طب ده انا والنعمة اخطفه واحبسه
مين ده اللي رافضي و هايسيبني
ده انا اهد الارض في عز
مش انا اللي اتساب خالص على فكرة

english.title: Who is it who doesn't want me
text: Who is it who doesn't want me and is leaving me
Whom they're trying to speak out of it but who wouldn't listen
I'll wipe the ground with him in the frigid
cold right in the middle of the street
I'm so not the kind of person you can just leave, just so you know
I could bury myself alive over this
would a man ever decline me
You know what, I swear I'd abduct him and lock him away
It's a walk in the park for me, I don't give a shit
Leave him somewhere nobody could possibly know
I'm being completely serious here, I'm not kidding
I'm a patient person, I never get tired
I swear I'd abduct him and lock him away
I'm a strong woman who's got an attitude
I don't give up that easy
Don't let the way I look fool you, I swear
If I were you, I'd avoid provoking me
I don't want to have to show you my other face
Because if I end up showing it to you
I'm not responsible for the consequences
You know what, I swear I'd abduct him and lock him away
It's a walk in the park for me, I don't give a shit
Leave him somewhere nobody could possibly know
Who is this who doesn't want me and is leaving me
Whom they're trying to speak out of it but who wouldn't listen
I'll wipe the ground with him in the frigid
cold right in the middle of the street
I'm so not the kind of person you can just leave, just so you know
I could bury myself alive over this
would a man ever decline me

arabic.title: مين يشغلنى
text: مين يشغلنى غيرك مين ياللى في عينيك
كل اللى ياما حلمت بية مالاقيتة و لاقانى
انا كل ثانية في عمرى جاية
ماقدرش اغيب عنك شوية دى روحى تنسانى
مين لية في هواك  اكتر ما لية دة
فى حاجات كتير مش هقول اية
ماتخلينيش ولا يوم بعيد عنك لا روح فيها
اشواقى مش هداريها منك صعب اخبيها

english.title: Who takes my mind
text: Who takes my mind but you
Who are you looking at in your eyes , this world is your laugh. What am I gunna dream of. Everything that I've dreamed of I never found and it never found me.

Every second coming in my life I'll live with you. I can't be without you. My souls is the most expensive thing that I have and is with you, there's a lot of thing I won't say what they are. And my eyes are running before me
Your everything I've wished for. I don't wanna ever be away from you. Always be beside me, I can't hide my love from you.

arabic.title: وعدتك
text: من أول قلبي ما ارتاح لك
و أقولك ايه ملاك بتوصف نفسها
و كل الكلام بتقوله و انت في حضنها
و عايزاك تبقى جنبي يا ريت
و عمري ما هبقى أنا لغيرك

english.title: I Have Promised You
text: I have promised you that I'd live the days for you
From the moment my heart felt ease around you
I have discovered that my dreams are directed to you
And from that day and it's me and you
And I'll forever be on my oath
And the one who you'll spend your life with
Who won't leave your embrace a second
And tell you what , it's an angel describing itself
And all the words you say when you're in its embrace
And my heart and all its secrets are with you
It's in my nature to forever be with you
And to open my heart and talk to you
And if it were to involve fatigue I'd forget it
The moment , my love , I complain to you
And I want you to remain by my side , I hope
Before you I have never loved
Nor have I experienced what I did experience with you
And for my whole life I will be for no one else but you
